attributes.action: Save Furnival Drive park in Burscough! Improve it instead!
attributes.additional_details:
Builders want to build on the park on Furnival Drive/Pickles Drive in burscough. There is a notice notifing people that 12 houses are going to be built there.  But then where will the kids play in summer? Many kids love to play on the park in summer and it really needs to be saved!

We also need improvements! The park has been neglected over the years and its time for an improvement! Other parks in burscough have been improved but not ours!

Sign this petition to support us in saving the park and getting imporvements! The more people, the more chance in saving the park!
